td.content: s:21 YO white m office manager presents w/ c/o 11 days h/o mild gradual onset of blurred vision and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 63 in, Weight 114 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered non-dilated fundus examination.

s:a m office manager aged 22 Ys presents with Kidney. These symptoms are present for about 5 weeks. o:Height 64 in, Weight 116 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urine culture.

td.content: s:white male aged 23 Ys presents with mild gradual onset of blurred vision x 6 weeks. he denies ever using cigarettes he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 64 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered non-dilated fundus examination.

td.content: s:a 23 YO male office manager with Kidney. he has had several such episodes over past 18 months. o:Height 64 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to nephrology.

s:23 year old white male office manager reports Kidney from time to time. denies any alcohol use Patient does not smoke o:Height 64 in, Weight 117 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered drainage - Right kidney, CT-guided - Right kidney.
